sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import Link from 'next/link' import Head from 'next/head' import useTranslation from '../hooks/useTranslation' import { Container, ContainerImages, ContainerAbout, ContainerMoney, ContainerTitleAbout, ContainerTitleMarket, ContainerTitleIncrease, ContainerParagraphAbout, ContainerParagraphIncrease, ImageArrows, ImageGoal, ImagePlayer, ImageBet365White, ImageFifaWhite, ImageSee, Page, Slogan, SubSlogan, Paragraph, Title, TitleIncrease, TitleIncreaseSpotlight, TextPink, TextBlue, TextYellow, TextGreen, Prove, BoxTitleMarket, BoxTitleAbout, ImagePlus, Video, BoxTitleIncrease, ContainerCTA, OverlayDark, OverlayGrey, OverlayLight, CardFree, CardFull, ParagraphCTA, ImageBarcode, ButtonFree, ButtonFull, LottieGift, } from '../../styles/pages/Landing' import barcode from '../../src/assets/animations/barcode.json' import gift from '../../src/assets/animations/gift.json' export const Landing = () => { const { t } = useTranslation() const presentation = t('presentation') const about = t('about') const market = t('market') const increase = t('increase') const cta = t('cta') return ( Brother Bet {presentation.slogan} {presentation.sub_slogan} {about.slogan} {about.paragraph.one.part.one} {about.paragraph.one.part.two} {about.paragraph.one.part.three} {about.paragraph.one.part.four} {about.paragraph.one.part.five}
{about.paragraph.two.part.one} {about.paragraph.two.part.two} {about.paragraph.two.part.three} {market.slogan} {market.paragraph.one} {market.paragraph.two} {market.paragraph.three} {market.paragraph.four} {market.paragraph.five.part.one} {market.paragraph.five.part.two} {market.paragraph.five.part.three} {market.paragraph.six} {market.paragraph.seven}
{increase.slogan.one}
{increase.slogan.two}
{increase.slogan.three}
{increase.slogan.four} {increase.slogan.five}
{increase.paragraph.one} {cta.paragraph.one} {cta.paragraph.two} {cta.button.one} {cta.paragraph.three} {cta.paragraph.four} {cta.table.one} {cta.table.two} {cta.table.three} {cta.table.four} {cta.table.five} {cta.table.six} {cta.button.two} ) }
